oai_dc:dc.dc:title: History of the 1st Tenn. Cavalry Regiment, U.S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The regimental history of the 1st Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA, was written by W. R. Carter, a veteran of the regiment. This copy of the book belonged to Pvt. James A. Russell of Co. B. Russell was from Rutledge in Grainger County, Tennessee. Stuck inside the book is a piece cut from a newspaper which gives a brief listing of the Tennessee Union regiments and where they were organized.
